short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shooniyh extension for auto-filling job application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Simple design
- Login user
- Autofill user job application forms on any job web page
- Adds a generate button to input fields that was not filled with values
- AI is prompted 3 times to answer then button is removed after third attempt with the help of the generate button

In beta mode!
More features will be added soon!
